official_title: To authorize the Secretary of the Interior to study certain lands for potential inclusion in the national park system, the national wild and scenic rivers system, or the national forest system, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Water Resources Development Act of 1986 to direct the Secretary of the Interior to conduct a study for the Congress to determine the eligibility of lands and waters within the Cross Florida National Conservation Area for inclusion within the: (1) national park system; (2) national wild and scenic rivers system; or (3) national forest system.

titles.title: To authorize the Secretary of the Interior to study certain lands for potential inclusion in the national park system, the national wild and scenic rivers system, or the national forest system, and for other purposes.
